name: Info Commands
desc: These commands can be used to get information about users, channels, etc.

commands.name: .help
commands.desc: This command links to the Charmy page on the SubSilence website. Wait, you're already here!

commands.name: .avatar [user]
commands.desc: This command returns your or the specified user's profile avatar. In the reply will be a direct link to the image.

commands.name: .userinfo [user]
commands.desc: This command returns information about you or user specified.

commands.name: .roleinfo [role]
commands.desc: This command returns information about the given role.

commands.name: .guildinfo
commands.desc: This command returns information about the current server

commands.name: .channelinfo [channel-name]
commands.desc: This command returns information about the given channel
